member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnection
member.summary: Used to make a connection to an ASP.NET Core ConnectionHandler using an HTTP-based transport.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnection.ConnectionId
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection ID.
member.remarks: The connection ID is set when the is started and should not be set by user code. If the connection was created with set to true then the connection ID will be null.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnection.StartAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts the connection.
member.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous start.
member.remarks: A connection cannot be restarted after it has stopped. To restart a connection a new instance should be created using the same options.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnection.StartAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.TransferFormat,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts the connection using the specified transfer format.
member.param: The transfer format the connection should use.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous start.
member.remarks: A connection cannot be restarted after it has stopped. To restart a connection a new instance should be created using the same options.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnection.DisposeAsync
member.summary: Disposes the connection.
member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous dispose.
member.remarks: A connection cannot be restarted after it has stopped. To restart a connection a new instance should be created using the same options.

member.summary: Options used to configure a instance.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.HttpMessageHandlerFactory
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate for wrapping or replacing the that will make HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.Headers
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of headers that will be sent with HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.ClientCertificates
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of client certificates that will be sent with HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.Cookies
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of cookies that will be sent with HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL used to send HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.Transports
member.summary: Gets or sets a bitmask combining one or more values that specify what transports the client should use to send HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.SkipNegotiation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether negotiation is skipped when connecting to the server.
member.remarks: Negotiation can only be skipped when using the transport.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.AccessTokenProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets an access token provider that will be called to return a token for each HTTP request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.CloseTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a close timeout.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.Credentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the credentials used when making HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy used when making HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.UseDefaultCredentials
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether default credentials are used when making HTTP requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.DefaultTransferFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the default to use if is called instead of .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.HttpConnectionOptions.WebSocketConfiguration
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate that will be invoked with the object used to configure the WebSocket when using the WebSockets transport.
member.remarks: This delegate is invoked after headers from and the access token from has been applied.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.NoTransportSupportedException
member.summary: Exception thrown during negotiate when there are no supported transports between the client and server.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.Client.TransportFailedException
member.summary: Exception thrown during negotiate when a transport fails to connect.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.ForceAsyncTaskExtensions.ForceAsync(System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary: Returns an awaitable/awaiter that will ensure the continuation is executed asynchronously on the thread pool, even if the task is already completed by the time the await occurs. Effectively, it is equivalent to awaiting with ConfigureAwait(false) and then queuing the continuation with Task.Run, but it avoids the extra hop if the continuation already executed asynchronously.
